ABOUT ME

I’ve always been drawn to the overlap of design & development. I enjoy challenges and being able to transform problems into solutions. I thrive for environments that constantly embrace new technologies. In my previous experience as a project coordinator, I can efficiently project manage and work with clients and colleagues successfully. I feel that these transitional skills coupled with a foundational knowledge of web development, strong visual instincts, and a “can-do” work ethic, I feel that I can be a valuable player in a team. I believe that my strong desire to learn & grow and willingness to help others is my most valuable attribute that I can bring to a company.

Transitional Skills

Highly self-motivated & resourceful with strong analytical skills and utilizes systematic thinking approaches to implement solutions | Excellent time management & organization skills | Strong attention to detail | Strong emphasis on ability to cultivate relations with customers & team members

Technical Skills

HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript ES6, Object-Oriented Programming, NPM, JSON, AJAX, API, Responsive Design, Visual Studio Code

Currently Learning

React
